mapper.insert: insert into menu(menu_no, menu_thumbnail,menu_img1, menu_img2,menu_img3,menu_img4,menu_img5,menu_img6, userid, menu_title,menu_text, ip,amenu_type_no) values(menu_sq.nextval,#{menu_thumbnail},#{menu_img1},#{menu_img2},#{menu_img3},#{menu_img4},#{menu_img5},#{menu_img6}, #{userid},#{menu_title}, #{menu_text}, #{ip}, #{amenu_type_no})
mapper.select:
select count(m.menu_no) totalRecord from menu m join member r on m.userid=r.userid
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'

select * from (select * from ( select r.username,b.menu_thumbnail, b.menu_no, b.amenu_type_no, b.userid, b.menu_title, b.menu_text, b.menu_hit, to_char(b.menu_date,'MM-DD HH:MI') menu_date from menu b join member r on b.userid=r.userid
and ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'
order by b.menu_no desc )
where rownum<=${onePageRecord*nowPage} order by menu_no asc
)
where rownum <=${onePageRecord} order by menu_no desc
where rownum <=${lastPageRecord} order by menu_no desc

select b.menu_no, b.menu_title, b.menu_text, b.menu_img1, b.menu_img2, b.menu_img3, b.menu_img4, b.menu_img5, b.menu_img6, r.username, r.userid, r.nickname , b.menu_hit, b.menu_date from menu b join member r on b.userid= r.userid and b.menu_no=${param1}
mapper.update: update menu set menu_hit=menu_hit+1 where menu_no=${param1}
mapper.delete: delete from menu where menu_no=${menu_no} and userid=#{userid}
